name: Yours is the light
description:
This is a 2 player hardware game that uses a lightbulb and 2 game controllers. Made for bit jam, 2016. It cannot be played on a monitor.

Find each other in the light...

Use gamepad's + to move
Use button to bounce signal & check distance
Player 1 checks x distance
Player 2 checks y distance

Time between light flashing equals distance
Light will stay lit when found.

(Mac build and documentation forthcoming.)
